spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Fey'Ri spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The Fey'Ri can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components.

trait.name: Weapon Master
entries: Fey'Ri are proficient with all simple weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Fey'Ri Scout can make 2 attacks with whichever weapon it has drawn.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Beguiling Apperance (3/day)
entries: The Fey'Ri physically manipulates its own appearance to seem less harmful. Its horns retract, its teeth become dull, its wings disappear and its skin fades to match that of a human.
